name: IRCCloud - Better font & Contrast
description:
Features:
- White text-shadow behind black text (Ash theme). 
- Smaller font, monospace.
- Darker colors, overall.
- Better spacing between nicknames and the message.
- Brighter time.
- Small drop-shadow behind content in the chat window.
- Works with all 8 IRCCloud default colored themes.

I update this theme often so if you notice a bug or want something added, post below.

Options for the chat-area:
additional_info:
Version 1.3 - Fixed drop-shadows in Ash theme.
Version 1.2 - Fixed colors and name spacing.
Version 1.1 - Fixed colors in all themes, made time area easier to see, and userlist have the matching color.
Version 1.0 - Works with all colored themes, in addition to Ash.
Version 0.2 - Added tiny drop-shadow behind text.
Version 0.1 - Will be adding more soon.
